EmailTemplate.description: US-0007771 - [AU] Additional Coupon Confirmation email post acceptance of Coupon Contract
EmailTemplate.name: Coupons Contract Acceptance
EmailTemplate.subject: Coupon Participation Confirmation email | {Coupon_ID__c} |
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {eBaySellerID},
This confirmation email is to advise you that we have recorded your acceptance to participate in the coupon offer {Coupon_ID__c} which is scheduled to run from {CouponStartTime}, {CouponStartDate} to {CouponEndTime}, {CouponEndDate}.
Your acceptance is in accordance to the terms and conditions as set out in the Coupon Term Sheet and Master Agreement, which you have agreed to on:
{CONTRACT_ACCEPT_DATE} from the following IP Address {ACCEPTED_FROM}.
If you believe that you have received this email in error or have any questions about your participation in the coupon offer, please reach out to retailpromotions@ebay.com.
Thank You
Retail Promotions Team
eBay Australia.
